items.title: Nextmillennium: New fields and adapter version update
Yandex: Set referer and target-ref to site.page
Sparteo: Add required query params to adapter endpoint
Missena: Update parameters and add versioning support
Release pipeline: modify the publish to dockerhub step
OpenX: Return buyer exts in response
Rules Engine Module: Dynamic ruleset from YAML geoscopes
New module: WURFL Device Enrichment Module
OpenWeb: Add support for test mode
fix: various fixes for scope3 RTD module
[Issue 4114] - Changed the bidder validation process when debug mode …
Issue 4006 AND Issue 3913 ortb blocking module lack of media type strictness configuration for battr
Changing name progx to programmaticx adapter
Metrics: standarize adapter connection metrics names
Pass targeting to ad server from prebid request.
Log nested structures from the configuration
Limit number of impressions in auction request
Mobkoi: Set integration type field to pbs and use the correct bidder endpoint
Include a warning in the auction response for bidders blocked by privacy settings
Seedtag: Adds GPP macros on user sync url
AdsInteractive: Make old adapter as alias for current
Rules engine phase 2: User sync in process auction payload
Events: Inject tracker if events are enabled
Support ticker-tasks as methods on modules rather than requiring separate implementing classes.
ORTB Blocking Module: lack of media type strictness configuration for battr
Floors: Fetchers race condition & upgrade testify
Use Concurrency To Download Vendor List
In order to protect users of prebid-server that don't use CGO, add build flag
Do not include hooks from disabled modules into execution plan
Zeta Global SSP: Make sid param required
Modules: Carry context from incoming requests to hooks
Capture and log bids rejected due to NBR 300 (Response-Rejected General)
